column7: Cafarella et al. report 14.1 billion HTML tables in English documents in Googles's main index [4] and over 400
column8: 000 Excel spreadsheets in the Clueweb09****** crawl [5]."

footnote-body: "We use the patterns in the PATTY system [12]."
sentence-with-footnote: "We start from a list of textual patterns that are associated with each relation; such patterns are detected by automatic methods for building knowledge bases from natural language******."
